thread.title: Great hotel - Review
thread.title_full: Great hotel - Review of Beijing Hotel NUO, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Natalie C
title: Great hotel - Review
text:
Me and my husband really enjoyed our time in the Beijing Hotel . It is a historic hotel more than 100 years old very well conserved we stayed in a suite for our HM and got a complementary upgrade which was amazing . The breakfast had good options and very tasty food . For my Husband bday the concierge brought a cake that was delicious. Extremely attentive staff ! Also very important Location location location!!!!
Would definitely recommend!
